replies.body:
Heh, no problem ;) 

-What exactly happened in that car accident? - My dad was picking me up from swimming class at 6. I sat in the passenger seat, all of a sudden a bicyclist turned right. If I remember correctly, we rammed into a pole or a wall. I then had a blackout. Luckily, the bicyclist wasn't hurt. I was in hospital and my right leg was full of scratches, and I couldn't move it. The doctor said that my tibia was fractured. I had to use crutches for the next 8 weeks. This month, I have to undergo rehabilitation. 
-Will you still be active in Slack? - Of course. :) 
-What's your fav subject in school? - It is cooking. 

Sure! See you in a year :D
replies.body_tagged:

{tag=fb4900805ca04f6597ccf62d1468b193} You are not the only one. ;( 
{tag=c58188cb25d84d4497b111a598917f1b} Thank you so much! You are a really cool person as well, you got an opinion on it and when you think it is right, you stick to it. It is an awesome trait to have. Good bye whanau, sad to leave :(

{tag=502f7dcfb6d94f85a94b97a15b0c951c} Good bye :( I will stop by the forums every now and then and catch up of what's going on.  If that happens, I will regret the day I left Avicus, as I should stayed and helped others to keep it.
{tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383} Goodbye Eric. I am sorry if I didn't give you that much attention to you. :( Keep building those maps and stay cool! See you in a year. :P

replies.body:
Hi normal! Yeah, sadly, I am leaving. ;( ;( 

- Do you like Pen pineapple apple pen? - Umm...I am not too fond of it, although I get it :D It is ok. 
- Do you agree or disagree with the circumference of 32 mini squares? - I do, cuz why not? :P
- Can I use your minecraft account? - Sure, hit me up on Slack or Skype: Athena_the_chosen
- Face reveal? - Ok! :P Go to these link: http://imgur.com/zn88T4h Also, follow me on Instagram: athena_the_chosen

I will miss you too SOO much! :D See you in a year

replies.body:
Hi Josh! 

- Thoughts on me? - You were always a kind, and warm person to begin with. I couldn't talk with you so often on TS, it was still fun to talk with you and hear you talk. You respect people's thoughts and think before you a make a judgement. Like I said on my Birthday AMA, because you respect people, people respect you. Keep it up! People like you are what keeps Avicus community a unique one. #Josh4SrMod
replies.body_tagged:
Hi Josh! 

- Thoughts on me? - You were always a kind, and warm person to begin with. I couldn't talk with you so often on TS, it was still fun to talk with you and hear you talk. You respect people's thoughts and think before you a make a judgement. Like I said on my Birthday AMA, because you respect people, people respect you. Keep it up! People like you are what keeps Avicus community a unique one. #Josh4SrMod

replies.body: Thank you so much Junr. Same goes for you too. I thought I would stay here for a couple of years and then leave to prepare myself for high school, but then again, life is full of surprises. Entering into this community was a great surprise to me. Thank you so much for everything that you have done for me. You gave me a GREAT start in this community. #Junr4SrMod

replies.body:
Thanks Abusive! I will miss the community as well. 

- Opinions on me? - You are a fun person. When I first heard your voice I was like "wow!" because it was the first time I talked with a stranger (not anymore ;) ). You and {tag=99b8a2a4cb224ba1a6837cd90a02aac5} were the ones who gave me courage to talk with anyone, regardless whether I know them or not. You made me open up to everyone, and I could never forget that. Thank you so much Abusive. :) 

EDIT: Hakuna matata! Btw, congrats on Builder, Jr Mod, and Ref! Serves you right :P
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks Abusive! I will miss the community as well.

You and  Junr were the ones who gave me courage to talk with anyone, regardless whether I know them or not. You made me open up to everyone, and I could never forget that. Thank you so much Abusive. :) 

EDIT: Hakuna matata! Btw, congrats on Builder, Jr Mod, and Ref! Serves you right :P
